Package application.client.managers

Class PaymentsManager

java.lang.Object
application.client.managers.PaymentsManager
public class PaymentsManager extends Object
This class is a singleton pattern. It deals with the management of payment.
Author:
Federico Canali

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static PaymentsManager getInstance()
      The constructor is called only if the static instance is null, so only the first time that the getInstance() method is invoked. All the other times the same instance object is returned.
      Returns:
      the instance object is returned.
